ChangeList.Description: Added the **userExperienceAnalyticsWorkFromAnywhereMetrics** relationship to the [deviceManagement](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceManagement?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **userExperienceAnalyticsDeviceScores** relationship to the [deviceManagement](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceManagement?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **esimIdentifier** property to the [hardwareInformation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-hardwareInformation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **chromeOSCount** property to the [deviceOperatingSystemSummary](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceOperatingSystemSummary?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the `activateDeviceEsim` member to the **remoteAction** enumeration.
Added the **persistEsimDataPlan** parameter to the [wipe](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/intune-managedDevice-wipe?view=graph-rest-beta) method.

Added the [activateDeviceEsim](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/intune-managedDevice-activateDeviceEsim?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [managedDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-managedDevice?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Changed the type of the **azureAdRegistered** property in the [userExperienceAnalyticsNotAutopilotReadyDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-userExperienceAnalyticsNotAutopilotReadyDevice?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Changed the **azureAdRegistered** property in the [userExperienceAnalyticsNotAutopilotReadyDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-userExperienceAnalyticsNotAutopilotReadyDevice?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from required to optional.
